info.name: Custom Username Colors
info.description: A style made to change a username's color. Want your color to be changed? Message user: "Salient" a hex code (color-hex.com), and wait for me to update the style (takes approximately two minutes or less). Don't install until I tell you its been updated! Also, don't forget to update the style weekly!
info.additionalInfo:
I'm still new to CSS, so expect some errors along the way. Currently trying to fix how some parts where the username is listed does not change in color.

Credit to Irraquated/JackV for the script!
